Class ButtonCollection

java.lang.Object
java.util.AbstractCollection<ButtonCollection.Button>
java.util.AbstractList<ButtonCollection.Button>
java.util.ArrayList<ButtonCollection.Button>
com.calcgame.main.ButtonCollection
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Cloneable, Iterable<ButtonCollection.Button>, Collection<ButtonCollection.Button>, List<ButtonCollection.Button>, RandomAccess, SequencedCollection<ButtonCollection.Button>
public class ButtonCollection extends ArrayList<ButtonCollection.Button>
A collection of rendered buttons, that have count, price and other properties
See Also:
  • Serialized Form

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    protected static class 
    ButtonCollection.Button
    Represents a button stored in a ButtonCollection
    static class 
    ButtonCollection.Coordinate
    Represents the coordinates of a rendered button, relative to the first button in a ButtonCollection

    • ButtonCollection

      public ButtonCollection(Rectangle rectangle, GameState state)
      Constructs a new collection
      Parameters:
      rectangle - the bounds of the rendered collection
      state - the current game state

  • Method Details

    • render

      public void render()
      (Re)renders all buttons in this collection.

    • render

      public void render(ButtonCollection.Coordinate coords)
      (Re)renders only the button at the specified coordinates.
      Parameters:
      coords - the coordinates

    • destroy

      public void destroy()
      Erases all buttons in this collection, does NOT actually destroy or remove anything.

    • add

      public void add(CalcButton button, Properties properties)
      Adds a button to this collection, regardless of whether it already exists in it or not
      Parameters:
      button - the button to add
      properties - the properties of the button to add

    • add

      public void add(CalcButton button)
      Adds 1 to the count of the specified button if it already exists, or adds it if not.
      Parameters:
      button - the button to add

    • add

      public void add(CalcButton button, org.python.core.PyComplex count)
      Adds count to the count of the specified button if it already exists, or adds it if not.
      Parameters:
      button - the button to add
      count - the amount of the button to add

    • addCount

      public void addCount(CalcButton button, org.python.core.PyComplex count)
      Equivalent to add(CalcButton, PyComplex). It is here mainly to avoid conflicts with the inherited add method and for mods
      Parameters:
      button - the button to add
      count - the amount of the button to add

    • getWidth

      public int getWidth()
      Returns the actual width of this rendered collection
      Returns:
      the width

    • getCoords

      public ButtonCollection.Coordinate getCoords(CalcButton button)
      Returns the coordinates of the specified button
      Parameters:
      button - the button
      Returns:
      the coordinates of any button that is equal to the specified button.

    • getButton

      public CalcButton getButton(ButtonCollection.Coordinate coords)
      Returns the button at the specified coordinates.
      Parameters:
      coords - the coordinates of the button
      Returns:
      the button at the specified coordinates, or null if there is nothing at these coordinates

    • setButton

      public void setButton(ButtonCollection.Coordinate coords, CalcButton button)
      Sets the button at the specified coordinates to the provided one, and keeps the properties of the old button.
      Parameters:
      coords - the coordinates, at which to set
      button - the button to set

    • getNeighbourCoords

      public List<ButtonCollection.Coordinate> getNeighbourCoords(ButtonCollection.Coordinate coords)
      Returns all neighbouring coordinates, where a button exists.
      Parameters:
      coords - the coordinates
      Returns:
      all neighbouring coordinates, where a button exists.

      a list of all buttons in this collection
